KADE LED Demo

This demo firmware drives 12 LEDs on a 2 player control panel.

The KADE should be connected to LEDs as follows (using above image as reference)

    1. A1
    2. A2
    3. A3
    4. A4
    5. A5
    6. A6
    7. A9
    8. A10
    9. A11
    10. B1
    11. B2
    12. B3

Buttons can also also be connected to B9 and B10 to control the speed on the LED animation sequence.
